contents:
20 Jian, 33, was arrested in June and accused of conspiring to study and nurse a toxic fungus at a (U of M) lab. A pathogen known as Fusarium graminearum can attack wheat, barley, maize and rice. She was caught carrying small samples while arriving at a Detroit airport in 2024. She will be deported. (www.detroitnews.com) posted 2 hours ago by MIMAGA 4 comments award share report block www.detroitnews.com
